rules.description: shift+cmd+l types javascript: and hits enter hack
Hold cmd+v for PASTE2 clipboard history
Hold cmd+c for PASTE2 clipboard stack
Left option -> KM: If Exists Trigger Action Menu

to_if_alone.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine" to do script "If Exists Trigger Action Menu"'

rules.description: Quit application by pressing left ⌘ + q twice
